caption.p: (a) CIE 1931 chromaticity coordinates of the light emitted by a GdVO 4:Dy 3+/GdVO 4:Eu 3+ stack (green symbols) and a GdVO 4:Eu 3+/GdVO 4:Dy 3+ stack bilayer (red symbols) as a function of the photoexcitation wavelength. Color coordinates of a mixture GdVO 4:Dy 3+/GdVO 4:Eu 3+ with 85% (dark gray symbols) and 60% of Dy 3+ (light gray symbols) along with the coordinates of the GdVO 4:Dy 3+ and GdVO 4:Eu 3+ layers (open circles) are also shown. (bâ€“e) Digital pictures of the PL of a GdVO 4:Dy 3+/GdVO 4:Eu 3+ phosphor bilayer for four different photoexcitation wavelengths: 280 (b), 290 (c), 300 (d), and 310 nm (e).
